note:
Came here from Twitter (Tsalmoth/Yendi there).

Interests: Pop culture (lit, horror, comics), politics (left), wrestling (AEW), edtech, academia.

Former book reviewer (SF, Fantasy, Horror, Romance, Mystery/Crime) @ Publishers Weekly. Generally only reading for pleasure these days.

Currently working in EdTech @ HarvardMed, formerly Emory, Brandeis, Emerson.

Gen X. Two cats (one 27 pounder, one wee 13-pounder), one dog (6 lb Chihuahua). All rescues.

Pronouns: He/Him/His

Same person who was yendi/tsalmoth on twitter (and yendi on LJ/DW). Deals professionally with #EdTech (currently at Harvard Med, formerly Emerson, Brandeis, Emory).

Personal interests: Politics (left, no further left than that), #books (former PW reviewer of SF/F/H/Mystery/Romance), with most of my current reads being mystery, horror, and nonfic (but still a smattering of SF/F). Also games (video and board), music, lots of other pop culture. I even write occasionally.
